basics.name: Neha Gupta
basics.label: Deep Learning and Web, on cloud.

location.address: 2239, Raja Park, Rani Bagh, New Delhi.

work.summary: Statkraft is a leading company in hydropower internationally and Europeâ€™s largest generator of renewable energy. I've been working with financial & time series data and systems supporting business or industrial processes
highlights: I've been closely engaged with the business development team and developed customized systems for the power market.

work.summary: Worked with the Director of Operations in a variety of areas including artist relations, facility and event management, scheduling, technical planning, and other areas.
highlights: Planning and execution of student events, Database processing, summary and distribution of event information.

work.summary: In the Air India training I dealt with functions related to aviation and management. The training was divided into 4 parts :
highlights: Radio Overhaul Shop : Included research on aircraft components, cockpit voice recorder, distance measuring equipment, emergency locator transmitter, very high frequency and HF communication.
Electrical Overhaul Shop : Included training regarding brake temperature monitoring unit, generator, auxiliary power unit.
Instrument Overhaul Shop : I learnt about aircraft engine, flight data recorder, gyroscopic systems, cabin pressure control and altimeter.

work.summary: Maintained, expanded and scaled the website  and integrated the data from various back-end services and databases.
highlights: Interacted with dozens of startups and investors. Also, organised pitching events, guest lectures, networking events.

work.summary: Developing end-to-end platform for selling the 'Next' brand appliances. The startup handled the online business for Next appliances. Experimented many e-commerce platforms for the web.
highlights: Apart from the primary business, we focused more on creating interesting technology, most notable one was:  A project that incorporates a cross-platform web-service to share web-links and bookmarks. Developed highly decoupled architecture designed on AWS for the web service enabling very low latency experience.

A web service that brings apple's continuity features, including calling, to the masses implemented by designing custom bluetooth protocol to support transferring audio to PC (A2DP to HFP), however it is apparently limited by the overwhelming segmentation in the bluetooth stacks

work.summary: First exposure to the corporate world.
highlights: Designed the front-end templates using jQuery, HTML/CSS.
Worked on a Point of sales (POS) system using raspberry pi, node.js, mongoDB and JavaScript Frameworks to make it light to support pi as the central server.

work.summary: Electrocardiogram (EKG or ECG) development and optimization using Solar energy by connecting the basic ECG circuit on the micro-controller to the solar cells and battery.

volunteer.summary: I impart my knowledge of programming languages to students
highlights: I do counselling sessions for shattered and fear-stricken students as it satisfies my inner desire to help others.

volunteer.summary: I partnered with some external accelerators and seed investors, to create an experimental incubation centre in the college.
A national NGO group where I have been part of many campaigns to rural parts of Delhi, Rajasthan and Punjab  to encourage technology and education.
Joined more than 10 clubs as technical head or management head for networking and exposure to developing technology. Some are GDG, GSC, ISA, ISTE,  CSI,

awards.title: CSI Young IT Professional, North India, Computer Society of India
awards.summary: I along with Shubham Jain, won the award for our research on designing an IoT chip architecture  using Nvidia Tegra reference and simulated it using Nvidia Tesla.
